properties.areaDesc: Camas Prairie; Southern Twin  Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley; Upper Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 9 at 12:59PM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise ID
properties.description:
...SIGNIFICANT MOUNTAIN SNOW POSSIBLE THIS WEEKEND INTO EARLY
NEXT WEEK...

.A series of low pressure systems will begin to impact the region
Friday bringing potentially significant snow accumulations for
higher elevations through Tuesday next week. Valley locations are
anticipated to see periods of snowfall Friday into Saturday to
create hazardous conditions.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches possible across the Treasure and Magic Valleys. The
Owyhee Mountains and the remainder of Owyhee county could see
total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with highest
accumulations anticipated over the mountains. Winds could gust
as high as 35 mph to create pockets of blowing snow.

* WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho.

* WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Saturday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON
